Single Diagram
Diagram 1, Image
The diagram depicts an image of the globe with links joining every continent on the planet. It signifies that the world is connected by these links as a means to share information and resources. This network of links is known as the Internet.
More Information Popup
The Internet Society (ISOC) provides leadership in addressing issues that confront the future of the Internet, and is the home for the groups responsible for Internet Infrastructure standards, including the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) and the Internet Architecture board (I AB).
The following are some of the main organizations that help manage and develop the Internet:
ISOC
I AB
IETF
IRTF
IANA
The website, Infoplease, is a good source of Internet usage statistics and resources.
